name: nexus-bot-typescript
description: A Discord bot for Nexus Mods, written in TypeScript

scripts.build: npx tsc --build tsconfig.json && copyfiles -f ./src/config.json dist && yarn copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: copyfiles -f -a ./src/server/views/* dist/server/views && copyfiles -f -a ./src/server/public/css/* dist/server/public/css && copyfiles -f -a ./src/server/public/images/* dist/server/public/images

author: Pickysaurus
